Title: How to Enable Teams Meetings
Summary: Step-by-step guide for enabling and configuring Microsoft Teams meetings
Content:
## Overview

This guide explains how to enable Teams meetings in your organization.

## Prerequisites

- Microsoft 365 administrator access
- Teams admin center permissions

## Steps

1. Navigate to Teams Admin Center
2. Go to Meetings > Meeting Policies
3. Select the policy to edit
4. Enable 'Allow Meet Now'
5. Enable 'Allow scheduling meetings'
6. Save changes

## Tips

- Test with a pilot group first
- Configure meeting options before rollout

Title: OneDrive External Sharing Best Practices
Summary: Security best practices for sharing files externally via OneDrive
Content:
## Overview

Learn how to securely share files with external users using OneDrive for Business.

## Security Considerations

- Use specific people sharing, not 'anyone with the link'
- Set expiration dates for shared links
- Enable password protection for sensitive files
- Review shared items regularly

## Steps

1. Right-click file in OneDrive
2. Select Share
3. Choose 'Specific people'
4. Enter external email
5. Set permissions (View/Edit)
6. Click Send

## Best Practices

- Document who you share with
- Remove access when no longer needed
- Use sensitivity labels for confidential files

Title: Copilot Prompting Tips
Summary: Effective prompting strategies for Microsoft Copilot
Content:
## Overview

Master the art of prompting Microsoft Copilot for better results.

## Key Principles

- Be specific and clear
- Provide context
- Use examples when possible
- Iterate and refine

## Best Prompts

**Good:** 'Summarize this 10-page report focusing on budget recommendations'

**Bad:** 'Summarize this'

## Advanced Techniques

- Chain multiple prompts
- Use role-based prompting
- Reference specific sections
- Ask for formatting

## Common Mistakes

- Too vague
- No context provided
- Expecting perfect first attempt
